name: Format Brightness

msg.payload='{"bri":' + msg.payload + '}' ;
return msg;

name: Format Color
func:

return msg;

Format chart
init chart options in flow
Store chart options
Resend - read comments !
info:
If minimum time is sent to chart, it will be absolute
Chart does not take it as time frame
So if change is in minutes, it is reasonable enough
to send new min value to chart in every minute
to hold time frame constant

name: Random
func:
msg.payload = Math.round(Math.random()*1000);
return msg;
